name: Daybreak
description: Shopify theme built on top of the Dawn theme and extended with TailwindCSS and AlpineJS.

scripts.test: for i in {1..3}; do npm run tester; done
scripts.css:component-purge: for i in ./sections/*-comp.liquid; do f=$(basename $i);x=$(echo $f | cut -f 1 -d '.' | cut -f 1,2 -d '-' );echo $x;npx purgecss --css ./assets/component.built.css -o ./assets/$x.comp.css --content $i & done; wait
scripts.css:component-watch: for i in ./sections/*-comp.liquid; do f=$(basename $i);x=$(echo $f | cut -f 1 -d '.' | cut -f 1,2 -d '-' );echo $x;npx tailwindcss -i ./assets/component.pre.css --purge $i -o ./assets/$x.comp.css --jit -w & done; wait
scripts.minify:all: run-p minify:alpine minify:css && run-s minify:js sizes:assets
scripts.sizes:assets: ls -lh assets/alpinescript.js assets/alpine.min.js assets/daybreak.min.js assets/base.min.css assets/tailwind.css
scripts.watch:alpine: nodemon -x 'npm run minify:alpine && npm run minify:js' -w assets/alpinescript.js
scripts.replace:rem: for f in ./**/*.liquid; do echo $f; perl -pi -e 's/(\d?\.?\d+)(rem)/($1\/1.6)."rem"/eg' "$f"; done;

author: Eric Kwoka
